title: Space explorer
text: App about space, NASA, our solar system and more.
content: This is an application built with React, TypeScript, Redux, SCSS, MaterialUI, Axios

title: To-do App
text: A regular TODO app with several functionalities.
content: This is a TODO app built` with React, TypeScript, Redux, SCSS. It has several features, like adding, editing, deleting tasks. You can also delete all, review your done tasks and more.

title: Destiny 2 react app
content: This project is a React-based web application that interacts with Destiny 2's API to fetch and display game-related data.

title: Cook-blog
text: Cook-Blog App with Login and Register Options.
content: COOK-Blog is a web application designed for cooking enthusiasts to explore recipes, create their own recipes, and manage their profiles.

title: Stopwatch
content: Stopwatch app created to count the time elapsed, pause, clear or continue the timer.

title: Multi-tool API
text: An API tool providing endpoints for numerous projects and usages.
content: Backend server using Node.js and Express.js, used to provide data to different projects of mine.
